result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. DEBRA L SALINAS

records.addlTxt: Motion hearing on November 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

10:37 AM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence Jean Broeren in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for DEBRA L SALINAS. Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS appeared by video. 
Attorney Amundson enters not guilty pleas on all counts on behalf of the defendant. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:41 AM Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS in court.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for DEBRA L SALINAS. 
Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:59 AM Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS not in court.  Attorney Erika Amundson in court for DEBRA L SALINAS. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
02:09 PM Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS in court via zoom .Roy La Barton Gay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DEBRA L SALINAS appeared by video means.
Defendant requests time to obtain counsel.  Bond continued. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant is ordered to report to pretrial monitoring immediately after court and must comply with pretrial monitoring conditions.
Not to possess any OC spray.
Defendant shall not possess any drug paraphernalia / any syringes unless medically required.
Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs / any prescription drugs not prescribed.
Not to associate with anyone involved in illegal drug activities.

Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS in court with Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder.  Defendant DEBRA L SALINAS in custody.  Scott Zehr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DEBRA L SALINAS appeared by video means with Attorney.
